PHRASE.LANG: It hasn't cost you much but it's the thought that counts! [#Legal]
Ça n'a pas coûté très cher, mais c'est l'intention qui compte ! [#Legal]
Er hat nicht viel gekostet, aber der Gedanke zählt! [#Legal]
Non hai speso molto, ma è il pensiero che conta! [#Legal]
¡No te ha costado demasiado, pero lo importante es el detalle! [#Legal]
그렇게 돈이 많이 드는 것은 아니지만 마음이 중요한 거죠! [#Legal]
It hasn't cost you much but it's the thought that counts! [#Legal]
It hasn't cost you much but it's the thought that counts! [#Legal]
